feed.title: Holdup on Block Alerts / Fraud Proofs ?

entry.title: Holdup on Block Alerts / Fraud Proofs ?
entry.summary: In a discussion on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, user Paul Sztorc expressed confusion about how segwit (Segregated Witness) would help. Another member of the community, Bryan, provided a link to discussions on the topic that had taken place on the bitcoin-core-dev chat channel in December 2015. The link is not currently available, but it may have contained useful information for those seeking to understand the potential benefits of segwit.
